title: Mobile Calendar
creator: taylor19
content:
It seems that the mobile app works well on my phone, but it doesn't have the calendar function.

How do people get by in this situation? Do you somehow sync the calendar on your phone with this? Note, I do have an Android device.

Thanks!

title: Thunderbird android smtp settings
creator: MarcBabin
content:
Hello, Not sure if my first post was published.

Over the last week non of my mails was sent to the SMTP server. I uninstalled the account to start over again.

Upon configuring the mailbox account, the MAPI step was successful.

However, configuring the SMTP server, I am receiving an error: Unexpected end of stream (view image) What is the solution?

title: My Thunderbird mobile Version 9.0 crashes when I enter an email address
creator: perpetuum-mobile
content:
BTW: The selection box "Which topic best describes your question?" should be added another category: "I want to file a bug report".

This is a bug report concerns Thunderbird on Android Version 9.0 running on a Samsung Note-3 running with Android 5.0:

When I enter an email address, it often happens that TB crashes when the second letter of the adressse's name is entered.

However, If I go to the address book and select the same user by his email address contained in it, I can write an email address to him, which I could not do the other way by directly entering the adressee's email adress into the appropriate field.
